results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 018
results.brief_description: Featured in this cinemagazine is a migrant’s success story with a costume jewellery business; translating over twenty of our wildflowers into unusual pieces in their original colours. Picturesque Widden Valley in Central new South Wales supports many herds of prime stock including Santa Gertrudas and Herefords, as well as its famous horse studs.

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 017
results.brief_description: A Sydney housewife finds wood carvings an artistic outlet, using oil paints to reproduce natural colours in high relief like those of the ancient Egyptians; a record wheat harvest in Western Australia has been produced at “Erregulla Springs”, an example of the possibilities of modern agricultural science and the use of machines and phosphates.

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 014
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
results.brief_description: Magazine items: Opal mining at Lightning Ridge. Shows where the stones are found, how they are mined and how they are readied for setting. Hobart Regatta: the march past, the yachts on the Derwent river and the first division race.

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 012
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
results.brief_description: Of great strategic and commercial value are the Cocos (Keeling) Islands, 1700 miles north-west of Perth providing an air-link between Australia and South Africa. The pleasant climate encourages outdoor life and sport of all kinds flourishes.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 010
results.brief_description: Magazine items: Ancient art of the potter used in manufacture of plastic lampshades; Taree’s attractions include facilities for yachting, golf, bowls; valuable minerals such as rutile and zircon; scenery, forestry and cattle industry. No other credits available.

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 007
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
results.brief_description: Cherry trees yield a rich harvest; fruit pickers, sorters and packers handle the crop at Orange, NSW. Massed display of colourful dances at New Guinea, where five tribes gather; children learn early and adults decorate themselves with ochre, feathers, pearl shell and grass skirts.

results.title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 002
results.brief_description: The magazine items featured include a look at a mobile kindergarten established in Canberra; new methods of whaling in a rapidly developing industry and Danish gymnasts captivating Australian audiences with their folk-dancing and gymnastics.
